response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's important to offer a fair deal that respects both parties' interests. We are proposing to sell the product to you at a price of $950,000. This figure reflects the product's worth and allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while still being competitive in the market. We hope this offer aligns with your expectations and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
